= Full Reference =
**{{{escape ( html, obj ) }}}**\\
Escape the given {{{html}}}.
== Examples

    utils.escape('<script></script>')
    // => '&lt;script&gt;&lt;/script&gt;'

=== Params ===
**{{{html}}}** {String} 
* string to be escaped

**{{{obj}}}** {Object} {Number} 
* A fake parameter

=== Returns ===
{String} 
* escaped html

=== Source ===

{{{
#!javascript

exports.escape = function(html){
  return String(html)
    .replace(/&(?!\w+;)/g, '&amp;')
    .replace(/</g, '&lt;')
    .replace(/>/g, '&gt;');
};
}}}
